original: @178b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lhun gyis grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @178b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las lhun gyis grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble AvalokiteÅ›vara, whose body, speech, mind, qualities, and activities are spontaneously accomplished.

original: dang por re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros sbyangs pa dag / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin chags pa sdug bsngal ba dang / phongs pa rnams kyis 'gyur ba mthong bas mi bzad pa skyes nas /
analyzed: dang por re zhig byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros sbyangs pa dag / chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa dang / bdag gir 'dzin chags pa sdug bsngal ba dang / phongs pa rnams kyis 'gyur ba mthong bas mi bzad pa skyes nas /
translated: First, the bodhisattvas, whose minds are trained, see that all phenomena are essenceless, that clinging to ownership is suffering, and that the poor are miserable.

original: thog mar gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor 'jug pa na bdag gi ltos pa ring du spangs nas snying rje chen pos gzhan gyis ma bskul bar bdag 'jug par ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlab bar bya'o //
analyzed: thog mar gang yang rung ba'i rnal 'byor 'jug pa na bdag gi ltos pa ring du spangs nas snying rje chen pos gzhan gyis ma bskul bar bdag 'jug par ting nge 'dzin gyis byin gyis brlab bar bya'o //
translated: When they first enter any yoga, they should bless themselves with concentration so that they will enter into the practice of the perfections, without being exhorted by others, having abandoned all self-centered concerns.

original: brtan pa'i gnas dang g-yo ba lus dang ngag dang yid //
analyzed: brtan pa'i gnas dang g-yo ba lus dang ngag dang yid //
translated: The stable bases, the moving body, speech, and mind,

original: rnam kun nyer spyod gzhal med khang bzangs rdo rje'i sku //
analyzed: rnam kun nyer spyod gzhal med khang bzangs rdo rje'i sku //
translated: are the celestial mansion, the vajra body, and the complete enjoyment of all.

original: gsang sngags dam tshig nga ro bcu drug mthar gnas dang // pha rol phyin bcu lha yi sbyor ba rnam dag bsgom //
analyzed: gsang sngags dam tshig nga ro bcu drug mthar gnas dang // pha rol phyin bcu lha yi sbyor ba rnam dag bsgom //
translated: and the sixteen consonants are the pure meditation on the divine union.

original: ldongs pas sdig pa mang ldan pa //
analyzed: ldongs pas sdig pa mang ldan pa //
translated: the blind, who possess much evil,

original: de dag rang bzhin zhi ba'o //
analyzed: de dag rang bzhin zhi ba'o //
translated: they are naturally peaceful.

original: chos gang la ni rnam par shes //
analyzed: chos gang la ni rnam par shes //

analyzed: de shes nyid ni pha rol 'gro //
